# isLocked

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether or not the file can be written to.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isLocked: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property may contain the value [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] because the user lacks the appropriate write permissions, the “user immutable” flag was raised, the parent directory or volume is read only, or the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDocument/checkAutosavingSafety()] method returned [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. Do not override this property.

## Locking the Document

- **lock(_:)**: Locks the document in response to the user choosing the Lock menu item.
- **unlock(_:)**: Unlocks the document in response to the user choosing the Unlock menu item.
- **lock(completionHandler:)**: Prevents the user from making further changes to the document.
- **lock(completionHandler:)**: Prevents the user from making changes to the document’s file.
- **unlock(completionHandler:)**: Allows the user to make modifications to the document.
- **unlock(completionHandler:)**: Allows the user to make modifications to the document’s file.
